reviews.review:
Counter Strike: Source is a great first person shooter, it's a lot of fun and has nothing of that pay to win bullshit.
I know that CS:GO is way more modern but i still recommend this game due to it being awesome and fun.
This game has a descent player base by a few thousand players every day. I recommend that you play this game now before it has no player left because the player base will probably shrink over the coming few years.
Love the game!!!!! played for years!
게리모드 때문에 카스 글옵 포함 다샀음ㅋㅋ 패키지 개꿀ㅋ
I first i just got it so i can play more maps on gmod but then i started to play the game itself and i really enjoyed my time playing it! 10/10 would surf again!

Played this game cracked for a lot of years finally purchased it 
big ups
Counter-Strike: Source is a first-person shooter video game developed by Valve and Turtle Rock Studios. Released in November 2004 for Windows,

Nice break from CS:GO sometimes. Other than that, just a GMOD pack filler is all.
